comments.raw_text:
I've seen this with my private build of Fennec on android and my Nightly build of Firefox on Linux, so I believe it is cross platform. On desktop I saw it on a yahoo login box. On android I see it on the twitter login box.

Not sure if this is a graphics issue or a content issue, but filing under graphics for now.
comments.author: lassey@chromium.org
